intro: Clidemia swartzii, commonly known as the scarlet beeblossom, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its vibrant red or orange flowers, which are clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are typically opposite, ovate, and covered in fine hairs. Clidemia swartzii thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of tropical rainforests.
